description.narrative: The objective of the Operation is to strengthen the performance of participating urban local governments in urban management and service delivery.

title.narrative: MCs that execute at least 80 percent of their annual O&M budget.
People living in targeted cities benefiting from municipal service delivery infrastructure created or rehabilitated under the Program.
MCs with IDAMPs developed and adopted, ensuring consultation with women groups.
Percentage of infrastructure contracts with gender responsive working conditions
MCs with timely audits conducted of annual financial statements and no adverse or disclaimed audit opinion.
MCs with Infrastructure Maps updated under the Program.
Score in the APA for achievement of institutional performance measures, averaged across all MCs that qualify.
Percentage of local infrastructure targets as set out in the annual work plans delivered by MCs utilizing Program funds.
MCs with at least 10% increase in OSRs.
IR Indicator 1.1.b. Computerized Financial Management System (Supplemental)
MCs with the full set of enhanced e-governance systems operationalized.
Annual performance assessment of Program MCs conducted on time.
